graphspace_python.api.client module¶

class graphspace_python.api.client.GraphSpace(username, password)[source]¶
API_HOST = 'www.graphspace.org'¶
delete_graph(name)[source]¶

Delete a graph with given name.

Parameters:name – Name of the graph
Returns:Success Message from GraphSpace
get_all_public_graphs(limit=20, offset=0)[source]¶

Get all public graphs.

Parameters:
  • offset – Offset the list of returned entities by this number. Default value is 0.
  • limit – Number of entities to return. Default value is 20.
Returns:

List of Graphs
get_graph(name)[source]¶

Get a graph owned by requesting user with the given name.

Returns:Graph Object if a graph with given name exists otherwise None.
make_graph_private(name)[source]¶

Makes a graph privately viewable.

Parameters:name – Name of the graph.
Returns:Graph
make_graph_public(name)[source]¶

Makes a graph publicly viewable.

Parameters:name – Name of the graph.
Returns:Graph
post_graph(graph, is_public=0)[source]¶

Posts NetworkX graph to the requesting users account on GraphSpace.

Parameters:
  • graph – GSGraph object.
  • is_public – 1 if graph is public else 0
Returns:

Graph Object
set_api_host(host)[source]¶
update_graph(name, graph=None, is_public=0)[source]¶

Update a graph with given name.

Parameters:
  • name – Name of the graph
  • graph – GSGraph object.
  • is_public – 1 if graph is public else 0
Returns:

Graph
